Package com.example.fire_and_based

Class AnnouncementUtil

java.lang.Object
com.example.fire_and_based.AnnouncementUtil
public class AnnouncementUtil extends Object
Utility class for handling announcements and notifications. Provides methods to send announcements to recipients and subscribe users to topics.

  • Method Details

    • sendToRecipient

      public static boolean sendToRecipient(Announcement announcement, String recipient)
      Can be used to send a message to a given user or all users subscribed to a topic
      Parameters:
      recipient - a users device ID, or a topic prefixed with /topics/
      Returns:
      whether or not the message was sent successfully

    • subscribeToTopic

      public static void subscribeToTopic(String topic)
      subscribes the current user to a given topic
      Parameters:
      topic - topic to subscribe to

    • newAnnouncement

      public static void newAnnouncement(com.google.firebase.firestore.FirebaseFirestore db, String content, Event event, com.google.android.gms.tasks.OnSuccessListener<Void> successListener, com.google.android.gms.tasks.OnFailureListener failureListener, android.os.Handler handler)
      Creates and saves a new announcement for the specified event. Sends the announcement notification to subscribers of the event topic.
      Parameters:
      db - The instance of FirebaseFirestore
      content - The content of the announcement
      event - The event associated with the announcement
      successListener - Listener to be invoked upon successful announcement creation
      failureListener - Listener to be invoked upon failure in announcement creation or notification sending
      handler - Handler to post callbacks on the main thread
